title: Wasteland 2 ( FLAC) (OST)
description:
Today, the developers of "Wasteland 2" (inXile Entertainment) removed the flac version of the Wasteland 2 OST off of gog accounts that bought the game.They did not give a heads up or a warning. They just sent a request to gog to have it removed immediately. Now the only way for users to get the flac version of the OST is to go to inXile official site and pay $10 to buy it. This was a disgusting and greedy thing to do to people who bought their game. Luckily, I download the flac soundtrack before they removed it. So for legit gog users who own the game. Here the flac OST of the soundtrack. Hope you enjoy.


------------

01 - Mark Morgan - Desert Nomads
02 - Mark Morgan - A Ranger's Journey
03 - Mark Morgan - God's Militia
04 - Mark Morgan - Synth Uprise
05 - Mark Morgan - Highpool Prison
06 - Mark Morgan - The Underground
07 - Mark Morgan - Tribal Wasteland
08 - Mark Morgan - After The Blast
09 - Mark Morgan - Mannerites
10 - Mark Morgan - War Of Borders
11 - Mark Morgan - Radiation Cloud
12 - Mark Morgan - Twisted Preacher
13 - Mark Morgan - Machines
14 - Mark Morgan - Citadel
